title: sArasAkSi (tAna varNa)
sahitya:
sArasAkSi nI pada pankajamuna sEvincina nannu brOva 
samayamu parama mangaLa dAyini paramEshvari patita 
pAvani parAtpari parAshakti bhavAni shivashankari


anupallavi

  vara dAyaki vAsudEva sOdari sundari harikEsha rANi shrI cAmuNDEshvari


caraNam    sAmaja gamanE sarasa daLa nayanE ambA
